original_text: Then they went toward the fortress of Tyre and all the towns of the Hivites and Canaanites. Finally, they went on to Beersheba in the Negev of Judah.
korean_text: 두로 견고한 성에 이르고 히위 사람과 가나안 사람의 모든 성읍에 이르고 유다 남쪽으로 나와 브엘세바에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: Then they went toward the fortress of Tyre
and all the towns of the Hivites
Finally, they went on to Beersheba
